form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: REQUEST FOR ASYLUM IN THE UNITED STATES, OMB No. 1115-0086

full_text: U.S. Department of Justice Form Approved OMB No. 1115-0086 Immigration and Nat ralization Service REQUEST FOR ASYLUM IN THE UNITED STATES PER COMPUTER INS Office: NR FCO MIA#236 EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZED THRU 8/23/88 Date: OCT 17 1987 10 / 1/ 23/87 1. Family Name First Middle Name 2. A number (if any or known) Espinoza Juliana A28-670-639 All other names used at any time (include maiden name if married) 3. Sex 4.
